ability.desc: You can transform the four elements into plants so long as you hold your breath.

skills.name: Twinned Blow
skills.desc: When you Skirmish targeting one character, you may “Flurry”, repeating the Attack with Swift at no cost. This reduces the dice rolled for both to half (before Advantage/Disadvantage).

skills.name: Frenzied Barrage
skills.desc: When you spend 2 or more Focus on a Finisher, you may substitute it with three Swift Skirmishes that roll half their base dice (before applying Advantage/Disadvantage) used one after another (these skirmishes cannot trigger “Twinned Blow”).

skills.name: Varied Blades
skills.desc: Your Skirmishes have an additional two effects that alternate every time you use Skirmish, resetting at the start of your Turn. The first Skirmish is Astral, restoring $[$[Tier] / 2] Focus, second is Vorpal, restoring $[$[Tier] / 2] Health, third is Astral again.

skills.name: Yearn
skills.desc: The first time you Investigate each Turn, it becomes Swift and has its Cost Reduced to 0. However, it can only be used to ask what your target’s current and maximum Health is. When any opponent is Knocked Out while adjacent to you, you heal a Wound.

skills.name: Obsess
skills.desc: When you know an opponent has half their maximum Health remaining, your Speed is increased by 3, and you ignore Difficult Terrain, but you cannot move unless you’re moving closer to at least one of said opponents.

skills.name: Devour
skills.desc: Once per Scene, when you heal a Wound using “Yearn” you may ‘Indulge’, Immobilizing and Dazing yourself. While you’re under these Effects, the Focus gained through Breathe and Charge are replaced with healing an equal number of Wounds.

skills.name: Easy To Hate
skills.desc: When you Investigate an enemy, you may use this Technique to Taunt them. This can only be used 3 times per Scene.

skills.name: Bully
skills.desc: Once per turn when you Taunt a character you may move up to 3 spaces towards them, if you move adjacent to them, you may Snare them and gain 1 AP.

skills.name: Add Injury To Insult
skills.desc: Your Attacks against characters you’ve Taunted gain $[$[Tier]] Advantage.
